channel.title: Online Resource - perchance.org
channel.description:
In trying to find a way to create a easy rollable table results generator, I found this website, [perchance.org](https://perchance.org/). I haven't played around with it yet, but, even though it looks like it'll take a little work up-front, it looks like a really easy way to have your tables ready for any spurious, generative/emergent moment. And it looks lightweight enough to run alongside a Google Spreadsheet character keeper!
Anyone used this? Any thoughts?
ETA I made a handful of Coriolis generators — check them out *~ https://perchance.org/coriolis-planet-generator https://perchance.org/coriolis-gas-giant-generator https://perchance.org/coriolis-asteroid-belt-generator https://perchance.org/coriolis-mission-generator
